DOC.brief_title: The Safety , Tolerability And Metabolism Of GSK221149A , In Pregnant Women ( 30-36 Weeks ) , In Pre-Term Labor
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , dose range study investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics GSK221149A administer intravenously investigate pharmacokinetics GSK221149A administer orally healthy , pregnant female uncomplicated pre-term labor 300/7 356/7 week ' gestation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy pregnant female , 30 36 week pregnant , without rupture membrane 1845 inclusive Symptoms preterm labor , ( great equal 6 uterine contraction per hour , least 30 sec duration , cervical dilatation less equal 4 cm , ( measure tocodynamometry ) . Exclusion criterion : Any clinically relevant abnormality identify screen examination medical condition circumstance make patient ( mother and/or fetus ) unsuitable participation study Any clinically relevant preexisting pregnancyrelated comorbid condition may affect maternal pregnancy outcome neonatal outcome ( eg . hypertension , diabetes mellitus , bleeding/clotting diathesis )
